Name: Apricot Mango Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Just as it says on the tin. Rich tropical and orchard fruit, but not overly sweet with balancing lemon citrus acidity, orange bitters and underlying gin botanical complexity.
History: Originally named Apricot Mango Martini this drink was created by yours truly during the fresh fruit Martini craze that swept through London's bars in the mid-1990s. Name and recipe updated by yours truly in September 2014.
Nutrition: One serving of Apricot Mango Cocktail contains 215 calories
